details.description: This script automates the running of rMATS for differential splicing analysis on RNA-seq data. It takes a RNA-seq output directory as input, and requires two additional files: 'groups.tab' and 'contrasts.tab'. The script uses these files to generate a sample sheet and then submits jobs to run rMATS for each comparison defined in the 'contrasts.tab' file. The script also builds a STAR index for the genome if necessary.
